content: Hi Jeyachandran! It's nice to meet you. Thanks for coming in today.
i am  B.tech  aiml kec student

So you're a recent graduate in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning from Kongu Engineering College (KEC). Can you tell me a bit more about your experience in coding and programming languages, based on your resume?
i worked as intern for centillion labs for 6 months

So you had a 6-month internship at Centillion Labs. That's great experience. Can you walk me through some of the projects you worked on during your internship? For example, what did you do for the Aristatal AI website, and how did you use technologies like Flask and Bootstrap?
i worked on a event management fullstack project

So you worked on a full-stack project for event management during your internship. That's a great project to work on. Can you tell me more about the technologies you used and what were some of the key features you built into the project? For example, how did you use React and Flask, and what kind of database did you use?
